nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation: @dev The constructor sets the initial `owner` to the passed account.

@dev Old owner requests transfer ownership to the new owner.
@param _proposedOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: createOwnershipOffer

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows the new owner to accept an ownership offer to contract control.
nodes.name: acceptOwnershipOffer

nodes.documentation: @dev Old owner cancels transfer ownership to the new owner.
nodes.name: cancelOwnershipOffer
